subject: Olympic Games (2020)
Japan Earthquake and Tsunami (2011)
lead_paragraph: Tokyo intends to bid for the 2020 Summer Olympics as a “big catalyst” for Japan’s recovery from last month’s quake-tsunami disaster, the city’s governor said.
snippet: Tokyo intends to bid for the 2020 Summer Olympics as a “big catalyst” for Japan’s recovery from last month’s quake-tsunami disaster, the city’s governor said.
